expBoard.headSentence: Currently, I am working as a Research Engineer in School of Electrical and Electronics Engineering at Nangyang Technological University, Singapore. My research topic is about Control and Controllability of Dynamic Complex Networks: Theories and Strategies.
jobDescription: Counter controllability by removing the critical nodes in maximum matching paths
Majority Control of Directed Networks based on Network Flow problems
Preventing network crash in KQ-model by applying cherished links to a certain number of edges

expBoard.headSentence: After graduation, I got my first job at a start-up outsourcing company which provides innovative solutions for embedded system and IoT application development.
jobDescription: Working with IoT Product Development using some wireless solutions such as Bluetooth, WiFi, Zigbee and custom RF

expBoard.headSentence: MobiFone Testing and Maintenance Center, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam is one of the best place for me to take my very first internship when I lived in Vietnam. MobiFone is the first and currently third largest telecommunications provider in Vietnam. Therefore, to be an internship member in Mobifone is a big achievement to me and it did help me a lot in graduating from university in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering field.
jobDescription: Understanding about implementing LTE Accessibility Optimization and measured LTE Accessibility performance
Performing a real-life operation in measuring 4G signal in a 1 km area location

expBoard.employer: Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology
expBoard.headSentence: Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology is one of the most prestigious univeristy under Vietnam National University Ho Chi Minh City. My major field is Electronics - Telecomunication Engineering. During the university time, beside the major specialized knowledges, I have earned a lot of experience in teamwork, comunication, research skill and problem solving
jobDescription: Smart Water Analysis and Monitoring System. Developed a smart device to collect some standard index of water such as pH, ORP, Temperature, Turbidity, EC, DO, water flow, etc
Used Raspberry Pi to transfer the voice which was recorded (in .wave) by a USB-Microphone into text by two methods: online and offline
Designed a smart and innovated FM circuit with passive components such as Resistor and Capacitor to transmit in nearby area
